snippet: John McAfee arrived in Miami after being deported from Guatemala, another turn in a strange journey that began after he was sought for questioning in a death in Belize.
abstract: Antivirus software pioneer John McAfee arrives in Miami after being deported from Guatemala, where he had sought to evade police questioning in killing of businessman Gregory Viant Faull in Belize.
lead_paragraph: John McAfee arrived in Miami after being deported from Guatemala, another turn in a strange journey that began after he was sought for questioning in a death in Belize.

headline.seo: After Deportation, John McAfee Returns to U.S.
headline.main: Software Pioneer Is Returned to U.S.
headline.print_headline: Software Pioneer Is Returned to U.S.
